summary:
Positively impacted LinkedIn Talent Solutions product teams as part of the UI Infrastructure Team.

My main project was an internal, centralized platform that automatically visualized technical debt for a specified organization, processing and displaying the latest data with a dynamically rendered data visualization. The end goal? Improved code craftsmanship across the organization!

Worked as a Frontend Developer Internâ€”the first intern ever on the Developer Experience Team!

As part of this team, I empowered developers with powerful APIs and beautiful web components that seamlessly integrate into existing applications.

timespan: January to April 2021, September 2021 to April 2022, September 2022 to April 2023
summary:
Educated and evaluated computer science students at the university level as an Undergraduate Teaching Assistant for five academic semesters.

Courses: Introduction to Computing Science I (CISC 121), Logic for Computing (CISC 204), Game Design (CISC 226), and Database Management Systems (CISC 332).
